Package view

Class UserInteraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.UserInteraction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewHandler
    public class UserInteraction
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewHandler
    Our ViewHandler implementation which shows the outputs from our model to the user via PrintStream.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      UserInteraction​(java.io.PrintStream out)
      Default constructor that takes in a PrintStream object and initializes the class attribute.

      Method that takes in a list of strings (portfolio data) and prints it neatly.
      void printFooter()
      Method that prints the text at the end of the application.
      void printHeader()
      Method that prints the welcome text for our application and some instruction for user to quit application.
      void printPortfolioData​(java.lang.String pfData)
      Method that pretty prints the portfolio in a tabular form, is dynamic depending on the number of columns that the input data string has.
      void printText​(java.lang.String s, java.lang.String color)
      Method that takes in a string s and string color to view it in the console.
